reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Could improve on office hours availability.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Makes complex topics easy to understand. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes disorganized. Interesting course material.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Williams is patient and explains concepts well.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Encourages critical thinking and class discussions.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Difficult to follow lectures. Needs to improve teaching style.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging storyteller. Makes history come alive. Heavy workload though.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Encourages students to challenge assumptions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex economic theories. Fair exams.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips to museums were a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting course content, but lectures can be dry at times.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging instructor with a focus on real-world applications. Group projects were challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Mind-expanding discussions. Prof. Kim is a master at facilitating deep thinking.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating subject matter. Dr. Parker is enthusiastic and approachable.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Practical course with real-world examples. Could improve on feedback for assignments.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher. Field work component was invaluable.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Nguyen is always willing to help. Great lab sessions.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Unorganized and often late to class. Interesting topic, poor execution.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Inspiring instructor. Makes complex musical concepts accessible to all skill levels.
